route: Ur → Haran (with Terah) → Shechem (first stop in Canaan) → Bethel → Egypt (famine) → Negev → Hebron (Mamre) → Gerar → Beer-sheba → Mount Moriah (Isaac sacrifice) → back to Beer-sheba.
key_events: Altar at Shechem, famine in Egypt (Sarai in Pharaoh's house), separation from Lot, rescue of Lot from kings, Melchizedek blessing, covenant of pieces, Hagar/Ishmael, Sodom destruction, Abimelech encounter, Isaac birth, Moriah sacrifice.
people: Melchizedek (priest-king of Salem), Abimelech (king of Gerar), Pharaoh of Egypt, Hagar (Egyptian servant), Ishmael (first son), Isaac (promised son), Lot (nephew).
